data.title: Colin Mochrie
data.text:
AKA Colin Andrew Mochrie

Born: 30-Nov-1957

Birthplace: Kilmarnock, Ayrshire, Scotland

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: Canada

Executive summary: This Hour Has 22 Minutes

Frequent contestant on both the British and American versions of the improv comedy show Whose Line Is It Anyway?.

Wife: Debra McGrath (actress, m. 1989, one son)

Son: Luke

Second City

TELEVISION

This Hour Has 22 Minutes 2001-03

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

Ecstasy (10-Sep-2011)

Mulroney: The Opera (16-Apr-2011)

The Puck Hogs (2-Jun-2009)

Kit Kittredge: An American Girl (20-Jun-2008) · Mr. Pennington

I Do & I Don't (2007) · The Bagpiper

The Tuxedo (19-Sep-2002) · Gallery Owner

Jane White Is Sick & Twisted (27-Jan-2002) · Barney

Totally Blonde (21-Dec-2001)

Lucky Numbers (24-Oct-2000)

The Real Blonde (14-Sep-1997) · Renny

Gotti (17-Aug-1996)

The January Man (13-Jan-1989) · Pat

Official Website:

http://www.colinmochrie.com/
